name: Slime Climb (Tommy Eaves Games)
description:
Welcome to Slime Climb! The first game produced by MicroPixel Studios. You play as Hopper, a friendly slime who has found himself trapped in a collapsing tower! As lava rises from the ground, you must climb as high as you can to survive as long as possible, using Hopper's stretchy arm to grab onto the walls. Play for the highest score!

There are three ways to earn points:

- Climb as high as possible

- Move as fast as possible

- Collect coins

Controls:

- Use the mouse to navigate the menus

- Clicking with the left mouse button will grab the wall with Hopper's arm
